description.narrative: A community water supply to the village of Katete, near Rushere in Kiruhura District in Uganda. The project consists of a large water storage reservoir, with entry settlement pond, adjacent shallow well with handpump and cattle trough. Project elements included sanitation improvements and health and hygiene training. The project partnered with the NGO Faith in Action Community Development and the Church of Uganda.

participating-org.narrative: Faith in Action Community Development (FIACD) - This is a UK charity with community projects in Katete Uganda. They are UK charity number 1153485. They acted as both part funder and also local client for the project.
The Church of Uganda provided community support and health and hygiene training through the local diocese based at Rushere Cathedral.
